thread.title: Dortmund's Watzke, Ferguson tip Klopp for Liverpool success

title: Dortmund's Watzke, Ferguson tip Klopp for Liverpool success
text: Oct. 11, 2015 | 04:22 PM Dortmund's Watzke, Ferguson tip Klopp for Liverpool success Liverpool's new manager Juergen Klopp hides his face with a shirt as he poses for picture after being appointed the club's new manager on a three-year deal, Liverpool, England, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015.
